backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage and authorization mixins plus extensive types for geography, proposals, user profiles, and internal data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing completed frontend tasks, associated files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence assessments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, their purpose, and recent functional updates.
frontend/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md: Architecture document outlining Whisper’s vision, hierarchical installation model, ICP canister mapping, and modular subsystem design.
frontend/docs/COMPLAINT_CATEGORY_SUGGEST: Specification describing stable-memory complaint category storage and schema for AI Secretary suggestions.
frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering prerequisites, configuration, and steps for deploying Whisper to the ICP network.
frontend/docs/HOMEPAGE_REDESIGN_NOTES.md: Notes detailing homepage hero‑section redesign, permanent mission text, contrast improvements, and visual/UX updates.
frontend/docs/PHASED_PLAN.md: Phased development plan defining deliverables and non-goals across stages from architecture through multi‑installation features.
frontend/docs/SECRETARY_NAVIGATION_HOOKS: Explains how features register navigable destinations for the Secretary assistant via a registry hook supporting options, free-text routing, and deep links.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_INSTANCE_FOLLOW: Provides a full manual smoke test for proposal creation, moderation, issue reporting, task management, and several UI regression checks.
frontend/docs/SMOKE_TEST_REGRESSION_PATC: Defines a focused QA checklist validating regression fixes around logo rendering, hover styles, profile handling, and navigation behavior.
frontend/docs/STYLE_GUIDE.md: Outlines Whisper’s visual design principles, color palette, typography rules, and accessibility-focused styling guidelines.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that sets up the root containers and loads the main frontend script.
frontend/public/whisper-logo-teal.svg: SVG asset containing a teal circular Whisper logo with stylized white elements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that handles SPA-style routing via pathname parsing and renders pages with lazy loading and a hero home view.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches runtime errors, logs details, and displays a user-friendly reloadable fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/common/HomeHeade: Renders the main site header with logo, navigation, login handling, and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/common/IconBubbl: Displays an icon inside a styled circular container with size and variant options.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingIn: Provides a spinner with an optional label for consistent loading UI.
frontend/src/components/common/LoginButt: Handles login/logout actions and shows appropriate button text and icon states.
frontend/src/components/common/UserProfi: Shows a dropdown with user profile info and actions like navigating to profile or logging out.
frontend/src/components/create-instance/: Implements the form for creating an instance, including name generation, geography selection, validation, and proposal submission.
County selector that loads counties for a state and handles errors and loading states.
Place selector that loads places for a county with support for errors and loading.
State selector component that fetches and displays all states with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/issue-project/Is: Dialog showing an issue project's overview and tasks tabs, with status, category, geography, and task list integration.
Task management UI for creating and toggling tasks tied to a proposal, with loading, error, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/proposals/Propos: Dialog that displays detailed proposal info with live query updates and links to open the related issue project dialog.
Main proposals list section handling fetching, navigation events, and opening detailed proposal dialogs.
frontend/src/components/secretary/Secret: Dismissible card prompting users to open the secretary assistant with styled messaging and a button.
Typeahead input for searching and selecting location options with keyboard navigation and loading states.
Main interactive secretary widget handling chat, discovery flow, issue reporting, and geographic selection with many hooks and UI components.
Creates a portal target for rendering the SecretaryWidget into an overlay div mounted on the document body.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountDeletion.ts: Provides mutations for users to request account deletion and for admins to process deletion requests, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
Fetches and saves the current user's profile using actor and identity-scoped queries with proper cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplaintSuggestio: Fetches complaint suggestions and all complaint categories by geography level using actor-backed queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInstanceProp: Checks instance-name availability and submits new instance proposals with validation and error handling, invalidating proposal caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentPath.ts: Tracks the app’s current route path using popstate events for navigation state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value for delaying updates like API calls while typing.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteProposal.ts: Mutation for deleting a proposal and invalidating moderation and proposal queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHideProposal.ts: Mutation for hiding a proposal with related query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, identity loading, and status tracking.
Defines React Query hooks to fetch, create, and update project tasks using the backend actor with optimistic updates.
Implements a SSR-safe hook for persisting state to localStorage with automatic JSON parsing and syncing.
frontend/src/hooks/useModerationItems.ts: Fetches moderation queue proposals and maps them into UI-ready moderation items with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadedImage.ts: Preloads an image URL and exposes ready/error state, resetting when the source changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains assorted backend query hooks for parent checks, proposals, single proposal fetch, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryAutoCreat: Mutation hook that auto-creates a Whisper instance proposal based on geography, handling naming, validation, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryChat.ts: Manages simple chat state for the Secretary UI, including messages and menu visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryGeography: Provides React Query hooks for secretary endpoints to fetch states, counties, cities, top issues, and city name search by hierarchical ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryInstanceA: Checks Whisper instance availability for selected geography levels and aggregates multi-level availability states.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecretaryNavigatio: Implements a registry for navigation destinations with keyword search and invocation support.
frontend/src/hooks/useSetIssueProjectCat: Stores and retrieves temporary issue project categories in localStorage using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateProposalStat: Handles proposal status updates with validation and invalidates related queries after mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSGeography.ts: Fetches US states, counties, and places via backend with safe fallbacks and caching using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theming, colors, utilities, and layout styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/formatProposalGeography: Formats proposal geography labels, population, and human-readable descriptions for UI display.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryFriendlyMessag: Builds friendly secretary messages based on geography, instance existence, and top issues, including helper functions for founding and existing instance messages.
frontend/src/lib/secretaryNavigation.ts: Defines secretary navigation options with keyword matching and utilities for creating and parsing deep links.
frontend/src/lib/uiCopy.ts: Centralizes user‑facing UI text for product, auth, secretary, profile, and other app sections.
frontend/src/lib/whisperInstanceNaming.t: Generates, validates, and extracts Whisper instance names based on geography and computes canonical names for Secretary workflows.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDeletionRe: Admin page for viewing and processing account deletion requests with authentication, authorization, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminModeration: Admin moderation page handling auth, admin checks, navigation, and displaying moderation items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/components/Mode: Renders a table of moderation items with status badges, actions, confirmations, and empty state handling.
frontend/src/pages/GeographyPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder geography page with navigation back to home and UI copy integration.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileEditPa: Profile editing page supporting name updates, image upload/removal, local-only fields, and account deletion requests.
frontend/src/pages/profile/profileLocalS: LocalStorage helpers for storing and retrieving profile fields not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileViewPa: Displays the authenticated user's profile with backend and local-only fields plus edit navigation.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Utility to resolve asset URLs safely based on the app's base path.
frontend/src/utils/secretaryProjectNavig: Implements custom event-based navigation for secretary-to-project transitions.
frontend/src/utils/spaNavigate.ts: Simple SPA navigation helper using history.pushState and popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and persisting them in sessionStorage, plus utilities to clear stored or hash-based params.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Normalizes various error types into concise user-friendly messages with special handling for moderation, auth, and backend errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines TailwindCSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines project state, required updates, and feature requests for removing editor dependencies and updating the homepage hero text.
